ticket.title: ActiveRecord does not serialize core data types
ticket.original-body:
ActiveRecord serialize seems not properly handling core data types like Fixnum, Float etc with class constraint and without it. I don't know is this bug or it's how AR serialization is designed to work. Anyway tests are attached. Same issue on master and 2-3-stable.
--- One of the test is rather a suggestion: allow to set multiple class constraints for serialization via array. For instance: @@@ ruby class Topic < ActiveRecord::Base serialize :content, [Trend, Subject] end @@@ If needed it can be moved into separate ticket.
